mapper.sql: id, student_id, course_id, unit_id, word_id, word, syllable, word_chinese, fault_time, push, memory_strength, type, update_time
mapper.select: select a.id, a.word, b.word_chinese, b.memory_strength, a.recordpicurl, b.fault_time, b.unit_id, a.sound_mark, a.small_picture_url smallPictureUrl, a.middle_picture_url middlePictureUrl, a.high_picture_url highPictureUrl from vocabulary a INNER JOIN study_capacity b on a.id = b.word_id and b.unit_id = #{unidId} and b.student_id = #{studentId} and b.push < #{s} and b.memory_strength < 1 and b.type=#{type} and a.delStatus = 1 ORDER BY b.push LIMIT 0,1
